name: beehiiv-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Beehiiv API integration - manage newsletters, publications, posts, and subscribers
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides access to Beehiiv's newsletter platform API. This extension allows you to manage publications, posts, subscribers, and segments directly from Claude Desktop. Perfect for content creators and newsletter managers who want to analyze their Beehiiv data and automate newsletter operations.

api_key.title: Beehiiv API Key
api_key.description: Your Beehiiv API key for authentication. You can find this in your Beehiiv dashboard under Settings > API.

tools.name: get_publications
tools.description: Get list of all publications associated with your Beehiiv account

tools.name: get_publication_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific publication including settings, analytics, and configuration

tools.name: get_posts
tools.description: Get posts for a specific publication with optional limit parameter

tools.name: get_post_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific post including content, analytics, and metadata

tools.name: get_subscribers
tools.description: Get subscribers for a specific publication with optional limit parameter

tools.name: get_subscriber_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific subscriber including subscription status and preferences

tools.name: get_segments
tools.description: Get segments for a specific publication to organize and target subscribers

tools.name: get_segment_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific segment including subscriber count and criteria
